Class XMLWriter

extends Object
    Utility class to write some XML.

    Damien

      • addStartElement

        public void addStartElement(String pTagName,
                   Map<String,String> pAttributes)
                     throws XMLStreamException
        Add a start tag to the current buffer.
        Parameters:
        pTagName - name of the tag.
        pAttributes - map containing the attributes of the tag.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • addStartElement

        public void addStartElement(String pTagName,
                   String... pAttributes)
                     throws XMLStreamException
        Add a start tag to the current buffer. This method can receive any number of pAttributes. The syntax to use is:
        addStartElement("TagName", "firstAttributeName", "firstAttributeValue", "secondAttributeName", "secondAttributeValue", ...)
        Parameters:
        pTagName - name of the tag.
        pAttributes - the attributes to add.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • addCharacters

        Throws:
        XMLStreamException
